summary:
Some armors with enchanting are added.
These armors influence neither an equipment slot nor appearance, but give only the enchanting effect simply.
These aim at adjustment of game balance.
By combining appropriately, you can enjoy Skyrim more comfortably.
descriptionHtml:
====================================================
Withe01_SpecialEquipments
by Withe01
ver 1.00
====================================================
- Description -
Some armors with enchanting are added.
These armors influence neither an equipment slot nor appearance, but give only the enchanting effect simply.
These aim at adjustment of game balance.
By combining appropriately, you can enjoy Skyrim more comfortably.

!!Attention!!
If it uses too much, game balance will break.
I want you to adjust by myself.

----------------------------------------------------
1. Equipments
----------------------------------------------------
[List]
- SE Enchantment Weapon　　　　　　　　　　>> One-Handed, Two-Handed and Archery do n% more damage
- SE Enchantment Magic　　　　　　　　　　 >> Costs of Destruction, Alteration, Illusion, Conjuration, Restoration n% less to cast.
- SE Enchantment Magic Another　　　　　　 >> Fortify Destruction damage, fortify Restoration power.
- SE Enchantment Ward 　　　　　　　　　　 >> While blocking, creates a ward that protects against spells for up to n points.
- SE Carry Weight　　　　　　　　　　　　　>> Carrying capacity increased by n points.
- SE Health Fortify　　　　　　　　　　　 >> Increases your health by n points.
- SE Health Regenerate　　　　　　　　　　 >> Health regenerates n% faster.
- SE Magicka Fortify　　　　　　　　　　　 >> Increases your magicka by n points.
- SE Magicka Regenerate　　　　　　　　　　>> Magicka regenerates n% faster.
- SE Stamina Fortify 　　　　　　　　　　　>> Increases your stamina by n points.
- SE Stamina Regenerate　　　　　　　　　　>> Stamina regenerates n% faster.
- SE Resist Disease and Poison 　　　　　　>> Decreases by n% your chances of contracting a disease and a poison.
- SE Resist Magic , Fire , Frost and Shock >> Fire, Frost, Shock and Magic Resistance by n%.
- SE Speed Multi　　　　　　　　　　　　　 >> Movement speed is increased by n%.
- SE Enchantment Thieves　　　　　　　　　 >> Muffle movements. Skill of Sneak, Pickpocket, Lockpicking, Speech are increased.
- SE Unarmed Damage Fortify　　　　　　　　>> Unarmed strikes do n points additional damage.
- SE Water Breathing　　　　　　　　　　　 >> Water breathing
- SE Water Walking　　　　　　　　　　　　 >> Water walking

[Craft]
First, "Special Equipment Craft Recipe" is created by "Blacksmith : other".
While you have this recipe, you can craft "Special Equipments" by "blacksmith : other".
All materials are one gold.
If a recipe is parted with, it will not be displayed on a craft menu.

----------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------
ver 1.00
- Release
author: Withe01
